topic.title: Discuss (U4): Mountains
topic.text:
Mountain making occurs at convergent plate boundaries. Based on your reading and a U.S. topographic map:

  • Identify where you think the previous locations of plate boundaries were.

Based on your reading:

  • Briefly compare and contrast the Appalachian Mountains, the Basin and Range province of Utah, and the California Coast Ranges in terms of their ages and tectonic origins.

Initial posts are due on Wednesday by 11:59pm, in which you use full sentences and proper grammar.

Respond to at least two other students' posts (at a minimum), which are due on Sunday by 11:59pm.

  • Be sure to respond to other students' posts with a substantive comment using full sentences and proper grammar.
